subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: David West scored 32 points and Chris Paul had 12 during a decisive third-quarter run as the New Orleans Hornets clinched the Southwest Division by defeating the Los Angeles Clippers, 114-92.
snippet: David West scored 32 points and Chris Paul had 12 during a decisive third-quarter run as the New Orleans Hornets clinched the Southwest Division by defeating the Los Angeles Clippers, 114-92.
